subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Horses
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: There is some science to the horse breeding business. But art, or at least gut instinct, drives decisions about which mare gets a brief encounter with which stallion.
